thread.title: Shekhar Suman Gets Roasted On Twitter For Allegedly Slamming Kangana Ranaut
thread.title_full: Shekhar Suman Gets Roasted On Twitter For Allegedly Slamming Kangana Ranaut

title: Shekhar Suman Gets Roasted On Twitter For Allegedly Slamming Kangana Ranaut
text:
facebook 
In a series of unfortunate and meaningless events, Shekhar Suman took to Twitter, last night, to post a rather controversial statement about a â€˜cocained actress'. One cocained actress was carrying the burden of her non existent stardom.She has fallen flat on her face n how.Guess this is poetic justice. â€” Shekhar Suman (@shekharsuman7) February 27, 2017 
Most peeps on the microblogging site believed it to be about Kangana Ranaut, and roasted Shekhar for his indecent comment. Kangana's movie, Rangoon , that released last Friday has not performed very well at the box office and Mr. Suman seems to be pretty thrilled about it. @shekharsuman7 Hi sir where do you and your super star son @AdhyayanSsuman keep your National awards ?? â€” ashish agarwal (@ashishagarwal_) February 27, 2017 @shekharsuman7 @AdhyayanSsuman : Sumans desperately seeking publicity through Kangana !! ðŸ˜‚ â€” Gaima Ching (@Gaima_Ching) February 28, 2017 
When Twitter users came to Kangana's support, Shekhar's son Adhyayan Suman came to his father's defence with these, rather sweet comebacks! 
The tweet was followed by a few more rude and insulting ones. Im horrified at the paid lackeys and sycophants who have jumped in defence of a lumpen so- called star.shame on you,you paid twitteratis. â€” Shekhar Suman (@shekharsuman7) February 27, 2017 I meant smone totally different but i guess guilty minds are forever conscious.plz don't jump to conclusions.i never named no one. â€” Shekhar Suman (@shekharsuman7) February 27, 2017 I meant smone totally different but i guess guilty minds are forever conscious.plz don't jump to conclusions.i never named no one. â€” Shekhar Suman (@shekharsuman7) February 27, 2017 I love the fact that illiterate morons react to my words.I also love the fact that i don't even luk at their tweets. â€” Shekhar Suman (@shekharsuman7) February 27, 2017 
Twitter is not taking it well, and so aren't we Mr. Suman!
